name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Fundamental algorithms and problem-solving techniques. Covers a wide range of computational problems.

name: Data Structure
description: Explore data structures and applications. Includes arrays, linked lists, trees, and graphs.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Intro to Python OOP principles. Learn to write efficient, modular code using object-oriented programming.

name: Software Engineering
description: Explore software development methodologies. Covers the software lifecycle, agile methodologies, and tools.

name: AWS Cloud Computing
description: Learn cloud computing with AWS. Explore services, deployment, and building scalable, reliable applications.

name: Database (MySQL)
description: Explore MySQL database management. Covers design, SQL queries, and hands-on experience.

name: Problem-Solving
description: Enhance problem-solving skills. Develop systematic approaches to complex problems and find effective solutions.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Intro to C++ for data structures and algorithms. In-depth understanding of C++ for implementation.

name: C Programming
description: Fundamentals of C programming. Covers syntax, data types, and techniques, ideal for beginners.
